name: Penguins Journey
description:
A very short game about a Penguin on the day before his life changes forever.

This is the first game I've ever made which may be obvious once you've played it. It's also my submission to the Penguin Heist Game Jam.

The game is currently skirting the line of unfinished and broken but I do plan to  fix that. I will be periodically doing updates to the game to lengthen and improve the experience. In the meantime I’d appreciate any criticism, constructive or otherwise.
